review: Amazon fire TV  interface is so much better than my cable interface. I would recommend this product to all my associates.
author: TheGiger

review: Love love love Fire TV!!!!!  Stop wasting money with these cable/satellite providers that don't let you pick channels, and overcharge for stuff you aren't watching.  Add Sling TV to your Fire TV, and pay very little.  You can also access Netflix, Pandora, iheart radio and so on.  If you have kids, you will find more than enough kids shows and cartoons.
author: Lisa M. Wolfe "LisaMarie"

review: These things are great! Very easy to use, love the remote with voice command.
author: RY Kechi Kansas

review: I have used a few devices similar to Fire TV and so far Fire TV comes closest to my expectations.  I'm still learning how to use it.  It is easy to set up and use, but the menu system has a bit of a learning curve.  I'm still not sure I'm using all of the functionality, but for quick easy streaming to my older but nice television, the Fire TV works well.
author: A. Edmundson "adrian8994"

review: I love it. So far the reception is very good. Quite an improvement from the other one we had.
